segments.text: Does it look like a good fit ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , it is very nice . I'll take it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How do you prefer to pay ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let me use my credit card .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Now , if you'll just sign here .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I hope you enjoy your purchase . Good-bye .
segments.speaker: S2
